Major Crops of Pakistan

Wheat

The staple food crop of Pakistan, grown mainly in Punjab and Sindh.

Rice

Basmati and other rice varieties are major exports of Pakistan.

Cotton

Known as "white gold", cotton is a backbone of the textile industry.

Sugarcane

Important cash crop used for sugar and ethanol production.
